General.Name: Stenocare AS
General.Description: Stenocare A/S cultivates, produces, imports, sells, and distributes prescription-based medical cannabis products in the Danish and European markets. It offers medical cannabis oil products. Stenocare A/S was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Randers, Denmark.

0.Name: Mr. Thomas Skovlund Schnegelsberg
0.Title: CEO, Co-Founder & Member of Exec. Board
